content.text: Hi there! I'm a 25-year-old mother of a 7-year-old daughter. We live in an apartment. My boyfriend is unemployed. What about you?
Hi! I'm a 17-year-old high school student. I play the trumpet in the band and I want to be a movie director when I grow up. My dad and I own over 600 movies.
That's cool! I've always wanted to play the trumpet. What's your favorite song to play?
My favorite song to play is "When the Saints Go Marching In." It's a really upbeat song and it's always fun to play.
I love that song! It's so catchy.
Yeah, it is! I also like to play "Satchmo's Blues." It's a classic Louis Armstrong song.
I've never heard of that song. What's it about?
It's about Louis Armstrong's life. It's a really sad song, but it's also beautiful.
I'll have to check it out. I love hearing about people's passions. What's your favorite movie?
My favorite movie is "The Godfather." It's such a well-made movie with great acting and a great story.
I love that movie! It's so iconic.
Yeah, it is! I could watch it over and over again.
My dream job is to be a movie director. I love making movies and I think it would be so cool to be able to make my own movies.
That's awesome! I hope you achieve your dream!
